Package: com.bmuschko.gradle.tomcat.tasks

[Groovy] Class TomcatStop

        • com.bmuschko.gradle.tomcat.tasks.TomcatStop

        • Stops the embedded Tomcat web container.

          Authors:
          Benjamin Muschko

          • Properties Summary

              Properties 
              Type Name and description
              java.lang.String  stopKey
              The key to pass to Tomcat when requesting it to stop.
              java.lang.Integer  stopPort
              The TCP port which Tomcat should listen for admin requests.

          • Methods Summary

              Methods 
              Type Name and description
              void stop()

          • Property Detail

            • @Input java.lang.String stopKey

              The key to pass to Tomcat when requesting it to stop. Defaults to "stopKey".

            • @Input java.lang.Integer stopPort

              The TCP port which Tomcat should listen for admin requests. Defaults to 8081.

          • Method Detail

            • @TaskAction void stop()
